name: Bomb Barrage
description:
An explosive 2 player battle game created with the GDevelop Game Engine

Features:

    - Explosive 2 player game play
    - An original sound track
    - And unique animations drawn with the mouse

Took a while to get this game somewhere close to completed but now I'm sharing it online!
Honestly the hardest part was sticking with the game engine I chose for it. (It was GDevelop or Godot)
After making a game with a GUI engine I think that their usefulness all depends on the project you're doing
As long as it's not some big triple A game with online play and cutting edge graphics, GDevelop isn't a bad choice
